scripts.dockerStop: (for /f "tokens=*" %i in ('docker ps -q --filter "ancestor=backend-app"') do docker stop %i) || exit 0
scripts.dockerRemove: for /f "tokens=*" %i in ('docker ps -aq --filter "ancestor=backend-app"') do docker rm %i
scripts.docker: npm run dockerStop && npm run dockerRemove && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 backend-app
